content:
Hello, has anyone successfully implemented the CPCDS Reference Server and Authorization server locally? Running into issues with getting the containers to communicate.

There is a temporary bypass, I can hard code the response to get passed the validate token. But the next time the RI needs to auth server it has an error (b/c of the hard coding).

Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

https://github.com/carin-alliance/cpcds-server-ri
https://github.com/carin-alliance/cpcds-auth-server
I believe @Dave Hill can help here. I'm not sure if this is live yet but MITRE led the development of this.
@Dave Hill Do you have any guidance on getting the two containers communicating?
@Jason Teeple -- did you get this resolved?
Yes, we are all good now. Thanks for reaching out.
